WorkPlace.Name: Semco Maritime
WorkPlace.OrganizationDescription: Dedicated to the energy sector, Semco Maritime is an international contracting and engineering company. For more than 30 years we have been facilitating design, fabrication, service and maintenance of our customers’ assets, providing comprehensive project management across all phases of energy projects. Semco Maritime is an international company with branches in Denmark, Norway, UK, UAE, Singapore, Vietnam, Central America and USA.

HiringOrg.Name: Semco Maritime
HiringOrg.OrganizationDescription: Dedicated to the energy sector, Semco Maritime is an international contracting and engineering company. For more than 30 years we have been facilitating design, fabrication, service and maintenance of our customers’ assets, providing comprehensive project management across all phases of energy projects. Semco Maritime is an international company with branches in Denmark, Norway, UK, UAE, Singapore, Vietnam, Central America and USA.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you a professional in the field of tender coordination looking for a new and exciting challenge? Then this is the perfect opportunity to take your career to the next level and influence the tactical and strategic development of sourcing at Semco Maritime!
 
Your position 
As our new Tender Coordinator for EPC, you will be supporting the Tender Managers with planning, coordinating, executing and quality assurance of tenders within the Renewables. This is from receipt of Invitation to Tender (ITT) to contract/project handover, in accordance with time schedules and client’s expectations and requirements.
 
Your tasks & responsibilities 
You will be one of the responsible parties for contributing to the growth and success of our Tender activity for EPC in our renewable business area. 
 
Your tasks will include but are not limited to:

  • Assisting Tender Managers with daily tasks and follow up
  • Communication and coordination with all stakeholders in the tender process
  • Participating the internal approvals, customer clarifications and contract negotiations
  • Identifying and incorporating any risks and opportunities in the tender
  • Developing the execution plan together with the technical adviser


Your profile & qualifications 
As a person we imagine that you are innovative, adaptable and responsible. You always strive to meet your goals and create the best results for you and your team. This naturally means that you must be an avid team-player but can still work independently.
 
To succeed in this position, we expect that you have the following qualifications:

  • Education as B.sc or M.sc of Engineering, Marine Engineer or other relevant education
  • Minimum of 2 years of relevant experience
  • Experience as tender support/coordinator
  • Fluent in written and verbal English


Welcome to Semco Maritime 
We offer you an interesting and challenging job in an international organization, where we strive to provide innovative and sustainable solutions globally. You will get the unique opportunity to work in an environment characterized by dedication, passion and ambition. 

The position is full time and will be in our office in Poland (Gdynia) or Denmark (Esbjerg or Ballerup).

We conduct our interviews on an ongoing basis, so if you are interested, you must submit your application as soon as possible via the link on the page. 
If you have any questions, you are welcome to contact Anissa Messar, Head of Tender and Contract Management at +45 79 14 91 03.

We look forward to hearing from you!
